snippet: Judge Robert Owen ruled that Commerzbank, which bought Dresdner and was later bailed out by the German government, must honor its contractual obligations.
abstract: Judge Robert Owen ruled that Commerzbank, which bought Dresdner and was later bailed out by the German government, must honor its contractual obligations.

headline.main: Former Dresdner Bankers Win Court Battle Over Unpaid Bonuses
headline.print_headline: Ex-Dresdner Bankers Win Battle Over Unpaid Bonuses
